titles.title: 216 O thou My Soul Forget No More (nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O Thou my soul forget no more
The Friend who all thy mis'ry bore
Let ev'ry idol be forgot
But O my soul
Forget Him not

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus for thee a body takes
Thy guilt assumes
Thy fetters breaks
Discharging all thy dreadful debt
And can thou e'er such love forget

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Renounce thy works and ways with grief
And fly to this most sure relief
Nor Him forget
Who left His throne
And for thy life gave up His own

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Eternal truth and mercy shine
In Him and He Himself is thine
And can thou then with sin beset
Such charms
Such matchless charms forget
